00022 SelectMat::SelectMat(QWidget *parent)
00023                  : QWidget(parent)
00024 {
00025     setWindowTitle(tr("Select Material"));
00026         setWindowFlags(Qt::Dialog);
00027         setMinimumSize(QSize(400, 500));
00028         setMaximumSize(QSize(400, 500));
00029 
00030         tree = new QTreeWidget(this);
00031         tree->setHeaderLabels(QStringList("Materials List"));
00032         tree->setMinimumSize(150, 150);
00033         connect(tree, SIGNAL(itemClicked(QTreeWidgetItem*, int)), this, SLOT(processMat(QTreeWidgetItem*)));
00034 
00035         textureLbl = new QLabel("Texture Preview");
00036         textureLbl->setPixmap(tr(":/images/ogre.png"));
00037         textureLbl->setMinimumSize(150, 150);
00038 
00039         text = new QTextEdit;
00040         text->setMinimumSize(300, 200);
00041         connect(text, SIGNAL(textChanged()), this, SLOT(updateTexture()));
00042 
00043         //Textures
00044         viewTexture = new QGroupBox(tr("View Texture"));
00045 
00046         topLayout = new QHBoxLayout;
00047         topLayout->addWidget(tree);
00048         topLayout->addWidget(textureLbl);
00049 
00050         viewTexture->setLayout(topLayout);
00052 
00053         //Material
00054         viewMat = new QGroupBox(tr("View Material"));
00055 
00056         midLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00057         midLayout->addWidget(text);
00058 
00059         viewMat->setLayout(midLayout);
00061 
00062         //Btn
00063         groupBtn = new QGroupBox;       
00064         groupBtn->setFlat(true);
00065 
00066     okBtn = new QPushButton(tr("&Ok"));
00067         okBtn->setMaximumSize(QSize(75, 25));
00068         connect(okBtn, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(saveMat()));
00069     cancelBtn = new QPushButton(tr("&Cancel"));
00070         cancelBtn->setMaximumSize(QSize(75, 25));
00071     connect(cancelBtn, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(close()));
00072 
00073         btnLayout = new QGridLayout;
00074 
00075         btnLayout->addWidget(okBtn, 0, 0);
00076     btnLayout->addWidget(cancelBtn, 0, 1);
00077         btnLayout->setAlignment(okBtn, Qt::AlignRight & Qt::AlignBottom);
00078         btnLayout->setAlignment(cancelBtn, Qt::AlignRight & Qt::AlignBottom);
00079 
00080     groupBtn->setLayout(btnLayout);
00082 
00083         gridLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00084         gridLayout->addWidget(viewTexture);
00085         gridLayout->addWidget(viewMat);
00086         gridLayout->addWidget(groupBtn);
00087         setLayout(gridLayout);
00088 
00089         scriptPath += QDir::currentPath()+"/media/materials/scripts/";
00090         texturePath += QDir::currentPath()+"/media/materials/textures/";
00091         strAllMat = "";
00092 }

00099 SelectMat::getAllMats()
00100 {
00101         QDir dir(scriptPath);   
00102         QStringList listFiles(dir.entryList(QDir::Files));
00103         for(int i=0; i<listFiles.size(); ++i){
00104                 if(checkMat(listFiles.at(i)) != ""){//the file has the good extension (.material)
00105                         QFile file(dir.path()+listFiles.at(i));
00106                         if(file.open(QIODevice::ReadWrite)){
00107                                 QTextStream script(&file);                      
00108                                 //Search our mat
00109                                 QString strMat = script.readAll();
00110                                 QString nameMat("material ");
00111                                 posMat = strMat.indexOf(nameMat);
00112                                 if(posMat != -1){
00113                                         QString matName;
00114                                         for(unsigned int i=posMat; i<posMat+50; ++i){
00115                                                 if(matName.at(i))
00116                                         }
00117                                 }
00118                         }
00119                 }
00120         }
00121 }
00122 
00123 QString SelectMat::checkMat(QString str)
00124 {
00125         QStringList listStr = str.split('.');
00126         if(listStr.at(1) == "material")
00127                 return listStr.at(0);
00128         else
00129                 return "";
00130 }
